translated: Thus, the speech of the Sugata is the blessing of correct truth.

analyzed: skabs su byon par gyur pa kho na'o //

analyzed: de bas na rnam par shes pa bkug ces te /

translated: In this regard, some say that the Sugatas, by the power of their connection with faith and commitment, come to the occasion of consecration and so on, but that sentient beings who dwell in the lower realms are not able to see them.

original: de ni ma yin te /

analyzed: de nyid ni nus pa'i stobs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur na /
